Benicia Old Town Theatre Group.knownFor: “ Theatre lovers treat ” Reviewed March 14, 2013 via mobile This is a great place to bring a group of friends or family. You can have assigned tables.There is a full bar and attentive staff. There is a senior and student discount too.
